tech.nocert:
You don't have the required certificate installed
Please download and install it from https://crt.sh/?d=2835394
tech.nextverq: Would you like to download it now?
tech.proxylessalert: You are trying to start the checker without using any proxies. I strongly recommend you not to do that, since it can cause your IP to get banned by Riot. To buy good proxies, you can join my Discord server.
tech.accselection: Press Tab to show files in directory Press Enter to select file
tech.accselectiontitle: Select a file with combos OR .vlchkr to continue checking:
tech.notkintererr: tkinter is not installed on your system. Please install it to use the GUI or use the console mode -c
tech.noaccountserr: YOU DO NOT HAVE ACCOUNTS IN THIS FILE

mainmenu.guide:
Use arrow keys to select and ENTER to confirm
Please select an option:
mainmenu.done: done. press ENTER or the power button on your PC to exit

slchecker.invalidaptoken: Your AntiPublic token is invalid or the server is down. Please ask the dev for a new one (on our discord server).
slchecker.rlerr: you have been ratelimited. wait 30-60 seconds and try again

checker.finished: finished checking. press ENTER or the power button on your PC to exit

settings.select: Please select an option you want to edit:

input.cooldown: enter the number of seconds to wait between checking accounts (min 0) >>>
input.skipkr: do you want to skip KR accounts (completely useless)?
input.appart: Do you want to participate in AntiPublic (alpha)?
input.aptoken:
Your AntiPublic token. This only matters if you wish to participate in the AntiPublic alpha test.
You can ask for access on our discord server.
input.checkban: Do you want to check permbanned accounts like valid?
input.checkrank:
Do you want ValChecker to check the rank even if level is < 20?
It'll make it slower but more accurate for some accounts

proxychecker.nofile: cant find your proxy file. press enter to return
proxychecker.deletebad: Do you want to delete the bad ones?
proxychecker.alert:
THIS TOOL CHECKS WHETHER THE CHECKER CAN CONNECT TO
YOUR PROXIES OR NOT.
IT DOES NOT GUARANTEE THEY WILL WORK
IN THE MAIN CHECKER BECAUSE RIOT BANS PUBLIC PROXIES
